# The `HistogramInfo` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This holds details about a histogram operation – a load -&gt; update -&gt; store sequence where each lane in a vector might be updating the same element as another lane. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::HistogramInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This holds details about a histogram operation – a load -&gt; update -&gt; store sequence where each lane in a vector might be updating the same element as another lane.

Definition at line 230 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/loopvectorizationlegality-h">LoopVectorizationLegality.h</a>.
